item.title: LeetCode-005-Longest Palindromic Substring解题报告
item.description: 题目描述 Given a string s, find the longest palindromic substring in s. You may assume that the maximum length of s is 1000. Example: Input: "babad" Output: "bab" Note: "aba" is also a valid answer. Example: Input: "cbbd" Output: "bb" 思路 Manacher(马拉车)算法，详细后续更新，先上
